::DeathScythe::

DeathScythe groans, opening his eyes. He tries to move, pain shooting through 
his body as he does so. The assassin frowns. Why hadn't his internal repairs 
taken over? He does an internal scan, finding most systems offline. There 
probably wern't enough online to start repairs.

He groans, struggling to his damaged legs and taking a few shaky steps 
forward.
